t: Targeted for a £500 promotional credit on Sponsored Brand Ads - never credited
s: I received an email on Nov 18 from Amazon Ads saying that I was eligible to receive a £500 promotional credit on Sponsored Brand Ads. The next day, I set up a sponsored brand ad and put the lifetime budget at 500. The budget spent within two days, but instead of receiving a promotional credit, ...

t: Amazon Credit Cards: What Are Your Options and Which Is Right for You? - NerdWallet
